Looks more to me like Pantheon's the one eyein' that sausage... ;)

Ok what. What. Have you _seen_ zuqling's art? She draws so much gay shit that seeing a pack of het cards makes me physically ill. Downloaded it, saw the travesty, then deleted it. "Hellmen?" Really? You just know someone from Riot was shoving their nose all up in this. Ugh. I'm just gonna go to her tumblr and stare at all her ashe/sej slash. 

GROSS{{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}
You should probably pull that stick out of your ass before it becomes a medical problem.
S+ rank on your comment, Enlegacy.

Is it so wrong to draw the average sexual preference (aka heterosexuality)? I get it, the movement happened. But acknowledge that an Asian marketing company controls Riot's merchandising and appearance. They're limited as to what they can do, and who cares? I think the art is nice, regardless of what it displays. Not everything had to be gay because one rights movement happened, and clearly the artist didn't back off because time was clearly spent on this art. If you don't like it, fine, but don't so nit picky on a day meant to celebrate love. {{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}

I think he/she meant that they're dissapointed Riot didn't add any gay couples **specially** on a day _meant_ to celebrate _love_ . Just voiced their thoughts on a much more rude way though, which only made it seem stuck up and uncalled for.

Honestly as a LGBT person myself, I don't really care that much that they didn't add any LGBT couples, despite the artist drawing a lot of slash. I expected a lil' bit of gay in there ngl, and didn't find any, but there's no reason to be upset about it. Especially considering that Riot would NEVER have the balls to do some LGBT cards considering their game is on Rusia and Asia, a country and a continent that are particularly homophobic.

Congrats to Zuqling for making art for Riot though.
you got Taric/Ezreal xD
As a close friend her Zuqling, I can say shes an ally for the LGBT community :)
